scenario_text.value:
Hey Aoi, you’re pretty close with Takuma,
aren’t you?

I’m sure you threw yourself into his arms,
crying that I said mean things to you.
Labramon is saying some awful tings to Aoi...

(That sure looks like Labramon, but the real
Labramon would never say such awful things.)
C-craven? But I haven’t done anything...

You’re always that way. “I have to help
everyone,” “I have to do my best”...

Playing the good kid, but actually
accomplishing next to nothing.

Aoi always works hard for everyone, that’s
the truth. Saying she does nothing is a lie.

Labramon sees that more than anybody. The
real Labramon would never say such a thing.
Is a fake. No doubt about it.
(I knew it. Just like with me and Agumon.)
